class.name: SQLite3ResultSet
class.description: This class provides an iterator interface for SQLite3 query results, allowing sequential access to rows returned by a SELECT statement.

method.name: next
method.description: Advances to the next row in the result set. Returns [code]true[/code] if a row is available, [code]false[/code] if no more rows.

method.name: current_row
method.description: Returns the current row as a dictionary with column names as keys and values as variants.

method.name: column_names
method.description: Returns an array of strings containing the names of the columns in the result set.

method.name: column_count
method.description: Returns the number of columns in the result set.

method.name: close
method.description: Closes the result set and releases associated resources.
